alert.note: Alert for Orange; Southern Lake County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 01 at 5:58PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Lake and southwestern Orange Counties through 645 PM EDT... At 558 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Horizon West, or near Windermere, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Winter Garden, Windermere, Bay Lake, Clermont and Oakland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
